mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderDetil(orderId, code, price) values (#{orderId},#{code},#{price})
mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.name,test,t2.id billId from user t1 left join bill t2 on t1.id = t2.userId and DATE(t2.date) = CURDATE()
mapper.update: update bill set test=#{test} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t2.id,t4.code,name,sum(price) outtotal,sum(if(t3.code=t4.code,price,0)) win,sum(if(t3.code=t4.code,price*47,0)) intotal from `user` t1 LEFT JOIN `order` t2 on t1.id=t2.userId LEFT JOIN lottery t4 on t4.id=t2.lotteryId LEFT JOIN orderdetil t3 on t2.id=t3.orderId where DATE(t4.date) = CURDATE() GROUP BY name,t2.id;
select code,sum(price)price from `orderdetil` where orderId=#{orderId} GROUP BY code order by code asc;
select c.id,o.code,sum(o.price)price from `orderdetil`o INNER JOIN ordercode c on o.code=c.code where orderId=#{orderId} GROUP BY c.id,o.code order by c.id asc;
